caption.title: Description of the included studies in the systematic review.
caption.p: Legend: Two articles [ 18] and [ 87] related to qualitative risk assessment were not included in this table. In the first paper [ 18], the authors have highlighted the importance of the risk analysis based on which policy changes has been implemented to control the epidemic that occurred in UK in 2001. In the second article [ 87], the authors described a risk assessment conducted with local expertâ€™s opinions. They concluded that FMDV entry risk pathways in Mongolia were estimated high in relation with livestock movements.
